TopicTitle: I want a plush Jeb figure...

Articles.Content:
For a while now, I have been wanting a Jebediah plush, in his Eva helmet and with a smile and all.

I don't know how hard this is, but can I have one? I know for a 22 year old MAN this sounds weird.... But I like that kind if stuff....
18 year old male myself, and i'd LOVE to have a jeb plushie

18 year old male myself, and i'd LOVE to have a jeb plushie

See? I'm not weird!

But I still want one...
I made this in sewing class a few months ago, It's crappy but I still love it!!!

I made this in sewing class a few months ago, It's crappy but I still love it!!!

http://i.imgur.com/o9xuuvF.jpg

I need to learn how to sew now.

I made this in sewing class a few months ago, It's crappy but I still love it!!!

http://i.imgur.com/o9xuuvF.jpg

That's thats you fleet master

Anyway, put him in his Eva suit and I might buy em!

That's thats you fleet master

Anyway, put him in his Eva suit and I might buy em!

It's funny, That explains my temper. I'm also older than I look, I'm 15 atm. Birthday's next month and I'm trying to get a ride to Wright Patterson AFB. I'll get pics of me with the YF-12 and SR-71 there to tease OHHHhhhHHHHhhhHh I didn't realize there were Schwalbes there!!!

EDIT: I've also noticed that most of the larger, well knows companies are run by Minors. I guess it's probably that we usually have more free time on our hands.

EDIT EDIT: HOLY CRAP V-2s!!!!! AND THE OHKA, BEST PLANE EVER!!! Hey I can fangirl too?

Edited July 11, 2014 by The Fleet Master

I WANT PLUSHIE JEB NAO.

No, seriously, I've been waiting since I discovered the game for Kerbal plush toys to come out. I'd have one sitting above my monitor in a shot
Learn how to knit or ask someone to knit a crochet Kerbal for you.
why are kerbal plushies not a thing? o.o im shocked

Learn how to knit or ask someone to knit a crochet Kerbal for you.

Sure I could try, but I'd rather buy a more professional one...

One of my friends is a brony... And being one, he bought a plush pony. Now, why can't that skill, be applied to Jeb? Hm?

I want one!

- - - Updated - - -

It's funny, That explains my temper. I'm also older than I look, I'm 15 atm. Birthday's next month and I'm trying to get a ride to Wright Patterson AFB. I'll get pics of me with the YF-12 and SR-71 there to tease OHHHhhhHHHHhhhHh I didn't realize there were Schwalbes there!!!

EDIT: I've also noticed that most of the larger, well knows companies are run by Minors. I guess it's probably that we usually have more free time on our hands.

EDIT EDIT: HOLY CRAP V-2s!!!!! AND THE OHKA, BEST PLANE EVER!!! Hey I can fangirl too?

Hey. I'm 22, not 12!

Hey. I'm 22, not 12!

I meant Zokesia and Voyager Labs (Well VL used to be big, she's the oldest active company).

I meant Zokesia and Voyager Labs (Well VL used to be big, she's the oldest active company).

True. One day, I strive for KMC to be one of them.... Would you help me to achieve this?
So, is anyone want some money and wanna make me one?
I'm 50 and I want one...

I'm 50 and I want one...

Well.... See my point exactly.

Someone, make some! You could make a killing!
Come on, nearly 10,000 members on this forum. And not ONE, can offer to do this to make money?
It would be illegal, not to mention rude, to make money on this. Jeb is copyrighted by Squad.

It would be illegal, not to mention rude, to make money on this. Jeb is copyrighted by Squad.

Ahhhh. Come on.... Fine. Can someone make them, for FREE?
must... get... stuffed... kerbals

must... get... stuffed... kerbals

I knu!!

It would be illegal, not to mention rude, to make money on this. Jeb is copyrighted by Squad.

Well if they have asked permission to Squad and get a explicit permission to do this, it's alright

Well if they have asked permission to Squad and get a explicit permission to do this, it's alright

Yes. If.

No one can forbid you to make plushies and give them for free, but if you try to sell them, it starts getting complicated.

Yes. If.

No one can forbid you to make plushies and give them for free, but if you try to sell them, it starts getting complicated.

people make custom plushies and sell them on etsy all the time, i found that out when i used to browse 4chan's /mlp/ board......

heres some of the avalable items when you search for "kerbal" : https://www.etsy.com/search?q=kerbal&ship_to=US

none are plushies yet, but given a known demand someone will take it up.

Yes. If.

No one can forbid you to make plushies and give them for free, but if you try to sell them, it starts getting complicated.

Exactly my point.
